endpoints.description: Create a new property listing with details such as location, pricing, and features.
Retrieve a list of all property listings available in the system.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific property listing using its unique identifier.
Update information of a specific property listing with provided details.
Remove a specific property listing permanently from the system.
Search for property listings using query parameters like location, pricing range, and features.
Add new features options to list as potential property attributes.
Retrieve a list of all available location data options in the system.
View aggregated statistics related to property listings, such as counts and averages.
Register a real estate agent within the system to manage property listings.
